trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBindingCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe TreeNodeBindingCollection viene utilizzata per archiviare e gestire una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>gli oggetti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control uses the TreeNodeBindingCollection class for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controllo utilizza la classe TreeNodeBindingCollection per relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>contiene proprietà <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>gli oggetti che definiscono la relazione tra un elemento di dati e il nodo che è associato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'associazione a un'origine dati in cui ogni elemento di dati contiene più proprietà (ad esempio, un elemento XML con diversi attributi), un nodo viene visualizzato il valore restituito dal `ToString` metodo dell'elemento di dati, per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Nel caso di un elemento XML, il nodo visualizza il nome dell'elemento, che mostra la struttura sottostante dell'albero, ma non è molto utile in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: È possibile associare un nodo a una proprietà elemento dati specifico, specificando le associazioni di nodi dell'albero.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>raccolta può essere compilata a livello di codice, viene in genere impostato in modo dichiarativo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the tree node bindings declaratively: 1.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la struttura ad albero, le associazioni di nodi in modo dichiarativo: 1.

trans-unit.source: Nest opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Annidare apertura e chiusura `<DataBindings>` tra il tag di apertura e chiusura dei tag di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Place `<asp:TreeNodeBinding>` elements between the opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags for each tree node binding that you want to specify.
trans-unit.target: Sul posto `<asp:TreeNodeBinding>` elementi tra l'apertura e chiusura `<DataBindings>` tag per ogni associazione di nodi dell'albero che si desidera specificare.

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage a TreeNodeBindingCollection by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: È possibile gestire a livello di codice un TreeNodeBindingCollection aggiungendo e rimuovendo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto alla raccolta, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Per rimuovere nodi dalla raccolta, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBindingCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object directly at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: La classe TreeNodeBindingCollection supporta diversi metodi per accedere agli elementi nella raccolta:-utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A>indicizzatore per recuperare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>oggetto direttamente in un indice specifico in base zero.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per creare un enumeratore che può essere utilizzato per scorrere la raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> oggetto alla fine del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Add per aggiungere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> at a specific index using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile inserire un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>in un indice specifico usando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to append.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the location of the added <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero della posizione dell'oggetto aggiunto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> oggetto è presente nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Contains per determinare se un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>nell'oggetto è contenuto il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene comunemente utilizzato per verificare l'esistenza di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto prima di eseguire un'attività, ad esempio aggiungendo o rimuovendo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> trovare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> è presente nella raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia tutti gli elementi di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> oggetto in una matrice unidimensionale compatibile di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> oggetti, a partire dall'indice specificato nella matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object into `bindingArray`.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo CopyTo per copiare il contenuto del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>nell'oggetto `bindingArray`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi vengono copiati a partire da `index`.

trans-unit.source: You can then use the array to access the items that are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile utilizzare la matrice per accedere alle voci presenti nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metodo per creare un enumeratore che può essere utilizzato per accedere agli elementi nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice in base zero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> gli oggetti che riceve gli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in `bindingArray` at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: La posizione in `bindingArray` in corrispondenza del quale iniziare a ricevere il contenuto copiato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the zero-based index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo IndexOf per determinare l'indice in base zero dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the node is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se il nodo non è presente nella raccolta, il metodo restituisce -1.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto viene visualizzato più volte nella raccolta, viene restituito l'indice della prima occorrenza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> da individuare.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of binding within the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero della prima occorrenza di binding all'interno di , se presente; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> nell'oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Insert per inserire l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>nell'oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>oggetto `index`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale inserire il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object located at `i` using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare l'indicizzatore di elemento per accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>dall'oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>oggetto si trova in `i` la notazione di matrice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzatore elemento consente di modificare o sostituire un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto nella raccolta direttamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> da recuperare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Remove per rimuovere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli elementi successivi al nodo vengono spostati verso l'alto per riempire la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile rimuovere un nodo in un indice specifico usando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile rimuovere tutti i nodi nella raccolta usando il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object at the specified index location from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato da di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object located at `index` from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo RemoveAt per rimuovere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto si trova in `index` da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli elementi successivi al nodo vengono spostati verso l'alto per riempire la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile rimuovere uno specifico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>oggetto utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile rimuovere tutti i nodi nella raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice in base zero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
